title: Endurance
description: This book is a short novella intended for reading alongside the Heart of Stone series, but after Kade.Sometimes, love is just that little bit too unyielding.To save the ones you love, sometimes you have to sacrifice your hopes and dreams… and your soul. There is nothing truer, especially when your hopes and dreams for your children are to be the very thing you have to sacrifice in order to give them hope and dreams. When friends become enemies, how far are Mason and Ava willing to go to fight for their honour and beliefs? But, a fight always has a loser and this time even the defeated may win, because when succeeding rips your family apart, was the fight worth the battle? Warning: This book contains explicit sex scenes including group sex, strong language and intense violence… oh, and one hell of an alpha male and one hell of a hard woman.
author: D.H. Sidebottom
